android.support.v7.widget.Toolbar.app:title: Prayers For All Seeking Life Partners

TextView.android:text: Confess your sins and sins of your ancestors to the LORD, and ask for His forgiveness.. Ask him to wash you clean with the blood of Jesus, receive his forgiveness with thanks and declare that you forgive yourself as well.
In the name of the Father, and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, Amen.

In the mighty name of our Lord Jesus Christ, I come against all you hidden spirit spouse and I paralyze your activities in my life. You can no longer hide below the surface because I now recognize what you've been doing; release me in the name of Jesus. I break any curse against my marriage in the name of Jesus I break any covenant against my marriage in the name of Jesus

I nullify the effect in my life by the Blood of Jesus Christ every dream of sexual intercourse with spirit husband / wife. Anything planted in my life to frustrate my marital life, come out now, in the name of Jesus. Let the axe of God come upon every evil padlock used to lock my marriage, in the name of Jesus.
Holy Ghost fire come upon every evil marriage entered unknowingly or knowingly, in the name of Jesus. My life will not follow any inherited evil marital pattern, in the name of Jesus.

I break the chain of marital stagnancy, in the name of Jesus. Holy Ghost, arise with your weapon of fire and give me my breakthroughs in the name of Jesus. O God, my enemies may have desired that I may not get married, but I pray that you do not grant them their desires. Put them to shame by helping me to be happily married in Jesus Christ Name, Amen!

Dear Heavenly Father! Lead me by your Holy Spirit in making a good choice for my life partner in Jesus Christ Name. O God of all goodness, I thank you for my life. You said in Genesis 2:18, it is not good for the man to be alone. I will make a helper suitable for him... I therefore pray that you cause my helper to come to me that we may get married according to your will in Jesus Christ Name, heavenly Father, I put all my trust in you, I my hope in you, king of kings hear and answer me, in Jesus mighty name I pray. Amen!
